items.content_html: Typedown is a lightweight, user-friendly JavaScript library designed to enhance text inputs and textareas with powerful markdown shortcuts. This package provides an intuitive way to format text using keyboard shortcuts, making it easier and faster for users to apply markdown formatting as they type.
items.title: dedeard/typedown: Typedown is a lightweight, user-friendly JavaScript library designed to enhance text inputs and textareas with powerful markdown shortcuts. This package provides an intuitive way to format text using keyboard shortcuts, making it easier and faster for users to apply markdown formatting as they type.
